title: PlanToken
description: Cryptographic binding between a flight-plan and its subsequent take-off.

token.description: Primary plan token identifier, e.g. SHA256 over all plan artifacts + context.

artifacts.description: Per-artifact hashes that contributed to this plan token.

engine_id.description: Engine identity that produced this plan.

protocol_version.description: Engine protocol version used when this plan was produced.

workspace_hash.description: Hash of the workspace state when the plan was created.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the plan was created (RFC3339).
